sentences.sContent: Conduct a self-assessment of your personality, strengths and weaknesses, and skills.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conduct a self-assessment of your personality, strengths and weaknesses, and skills.
sentences.sCn: 针对你的性格、优点、缺点和技能做一个自我评估。

sentences.sContent: The first step in all improvement endeavors is the same: a realistic self-assessment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first step in all improvement endeavors is the same: a realistic self-assessment.
sentences.sCn: 所有改进努力的第一步都是相同的：一个现实的自我评估。

trans.tranOther: when you judge your own work or progress
